actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The lizardfolk attacks with its club and shield.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage  or 9 (2d6 + 2) piercing damage if the attack is made with advantage.

actions.name: Club
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Shield
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Javelin
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

special_abilities.name: Hold Breath
special_abilities.desc: The lizardfolk can hold its breath for 15 minutes.
